summary: This is an email from July 22, 2019, in which a U.S. official forwards a request from the Austrian Embassy for information regarding an alleged Austrian passport found in Jeffrey Epstein's possession. The email seeks guidance on what information can be shared.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The email discusses an alleged Austrian passport that was found in his possession, which is the subject of an inquiry from the Austrian Embassy.

events.title: Austrian Embassy Inquiry on Epstein Passport
events.description: The Austrian Embassy contacts a U.S. official to request information regarding an alleged Austrian passport that was in Jeffrey Epstein's possession.

keyFacts: The Austrian Embassy made an official inquiry regarding an alleged Austrian passport found in Jeffrey Epstein's possession.
The inquiry was forwarded by a U.S. official on July 22, 2019, seeking guidance on what information could be shared.
The possession of a foreign passport by Epstein was a point of international investigative interest following his arrest.
